extensions.description: This extension provides examples of the AZD extension framework.

examples.name: context
examples.description: Displays the current `azd` project & environment context.

examples.name: prompt
examples.description: Display prompt capabilities.

extensions.description: This extension provides custom commands for building AI applications using Azure Developer CLI.

examples.name: start
examples.description: Provides a guided experience for building AI applications using Azure Developer CLI.

extensions.description: This extension provides a set of tools for AZD extension developers to test and debug their extensions.

examples.name: init
examples.description: Initialize a new AZD extension project.

examples.name: build
examples.description: Build the AZD extension project.

examples.name: pack
examples.description: Package the AZD extension project into a distributable format and add to local registry.

examples.name: release
examples.description: Create an new release of the AZD extension project to a Github repository.

examples.name: watch
examples.description: Watch for changes in the extension project and automatically rebuild and reload the extension.
